name: The QEGS Adventure II
overview: The sequel to the original QEGS Adventure game. In this game you must find all three parts of your English Assignment and return them to the General Office. A cash prize was offered to the first person to send a postcard to Mad Rabbit Software with the serial number of the adventure and the message(s) given on the final screen when the adventure was completed. Unfortunately the closing date for claiming the money was 31st May 1989! The game was created using the Graphic Adventure Creator.
